mapper.select: select * from post_table where post_tag = #{postTag} order by post_date desc limit 0, #{count};
mapper.insert: insert into post_table(post_id, uid, post_type, post_title, post_content, post_tag, view_times, post_date) values(#{postId}, #{uid},#{postType}, #{postTitle},#{postContent},#{postTag},#{viewTimes},#{postDate});
mapper.update: update post_table set post_type=#{postType} where post_id=#{postId};
mapper.select: select * from post_table where post_tag = #{postTag} and post_date < #{startTime} order by post_date desc limit #{count};
select like_status from user_like_post where uid=#{uid} and post_id=#{postId};
mapper.update: update post_table set like_cnt = like_cnt + #{cnt} where post_id = #{postId};
update user_like_post set like_status = #{likeStatus} where uid = #{uid} and post_id = #{postId};
mapper.insert: insert into user_like_post(uid, post_id, like_status) values(#{uid}, #{postId}, #{likeStatus});
mapper.delete: delete from user_like_post where uid = #{uid} and post_id = #{postId};
